articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: 5 talking points | SA v Afghanistan: Proteas' chasing jitters calmed, somewhat ...
articles.description: Herman Mostert highlights FIVE talking points after South Africa's five-wicket Cricket World Cup win over Afghanistan in Ahmedabad.
articles.content:
Rassie, Phehlukwayo calm SA's chasing jitters
Chasing 245 for victory, the Proteas found themselves in a tricky situation at 182/5 when Andile Phehlukwayo joined Rassie van der Dussen at the crease.… [+69 chars]

articles.title: Bavuma hamstring strain shows 'improvement', but Proteas skipper continues to be 'monitored'
articles.description: Cricket SA confirmed on Saturday that Proteas captain Temba Bavuma sustained a right hamstring strain against Afghanistan.
articles.content:
• Cricket SA confirmed on Saturday that Proteas captain Temba Bavuma sustained a right hamstring strain against Afghanistan.
